turn.12: Places of attraction are, ♦ WildlifeKanha National Park, Bandhavgarh National Park(website), Pench Tiger Reserve ♦HeritageKhajuraho Temple Group, Orchha, Bhimbetka Rock Shelters Caves ♦WorshipUjjain, Omkareshwar, Maheshwar, Maihar, Sanchi ♦Water Bodies / Lakes/ Dams Bhojtal "Upper Lake- Bhopal", Gandhi Sagar Dam, Indirasagar Dam, Pipliyapala, Tawa Reservoir, Bhedaghat Maharashtra is one of the most visited state in India by foreign tourists, with over 4.3 million foreign tourist arrivals in 2014.
